name: Wandering Soul
description:
2D competitive runner where one player tries to dodge traps chosen by the other player. Made in under 24 hours by Greg, Conner, Kaleb, and Brady for The Saltworks Arcade Jam in SLC, UT.

Built for an arcade cabinet, but it will work on a PC as well.

Runner: press SPACE to jump, CTRL to punch
Demon: hold ARROWS/WASD to select trap
